azaq318 where is the DLC? i can't find it, ive tried installing and reinstalling over 5 times .
Well the game works; just not on my system. Good thing I didn't buy it. To anyone having trouble getting the game to run in English, run as admin.

those who have problems changing the language from launcher, just copy the skidrow configuration file to desktop or anywhere, open it. Then inside The part where russian is written, just swap it with english. then copy it over the real skidrow file in the game directory!! u will see it has turned into english!!
Can someone Pleaseeeeeeee tell me where is the 2 dlc's I can't find them anywhere???????
There aren't any dlcs but after install the game use v1.03.16.4825 patch and do the crack then works like a charm and the game don't have any language problem.Sorry for my bad english!

FOR THOSE WHO CAN NOT FIND THE DLC's:
First you just need to go to the Main Menu, then select "Episodes" and choose the episodes "The Signal" and "The Writer", which are the last two.
